hotels.title: Stylish Thailand Retreat in Coastal Rayong with Restaurant, Bar & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Boasting all-modern amenities and comfort touches, this homey retreat is perfectly positioned for exploring the best of eastern Thailand. Within the hotel, enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor garden pool, sip cocktails at After 8 lobby bar or indulge in local flavours at the onsite restaurant. For some time to yourself, drop by the fitness centre while the little ones are taken care of at the Kids' Club. With a central location in coastal Rayong, you're within easy reach of the city's famed night market, the Rayong Aquarium, Sang Chang Beach and more. A little further afield, take a day trip to the idyllic Koh Samet island or explore nearby national parks.

hotels.title: Beachfront Thailand Retreat in Coastal-Cool Rayong with Outdoor Pool, Six Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience the allure of Thailand's eastern coast with a relaxing stay at Mercure Rayong Lomtalay Villas & Resort, a stunning retreat hidden in the lush vegetation of the Rayong region. This sophisticated sanctuary offers unrivalled access to the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand, serving as the perfect launchpad to the stunning Koh Samet and Koh Mun islands. Relax by the pool and relish in a cocktail at the oceanfront bar, delight in local flavours at nearby seafood markets, or enjoy local produce selections at one of the six on-site restaurants and bars. When you're not indulging in a body scrub or aroma massages at the spa, take a day trip to nearby the idyllic Koh Samet Island or explore nearby national parks.

hotels.title: Beachfront Rayong Resort on the Gulf of Thailand with Three Restaurants, Three Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the serene beauty of Thailand's eastern coastline with a stay at this beachfront oasis, just steps from the azure waters and powder-white sands of Rim Pae Beach. Enjoy refreshing dips in the hotel's three outdoor pools, savour authentic Thai cuisine at The Garden or sip tropical cocktails at the poolside bar. Nearby, explore the vibrant local markets of Rayong city or take the ferry across to stunning Koh Samet. The hotel also offers a range of activities, from beach volleyball to cycling, and a tranquil day spa for a truly relaxing stay.
